channel.title: CVE Feed for AMPHP -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMPHP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2653|2024-09-06T16:43:42.206Z -- amphp -- amphp%2Fhttp-client
item.description: amphp/http will collect CONTINUATION frames in an unbounded buffer and will not check a limit until it has received the set END_HEADERS flag, resulting in an OOM crash.

item.title: CVE-2024-2653|2024-04-03T18:28:25.344Z -- amphp -- amphp%2Fhttp-client
item.description: amphp/http will collect CONTINUATION frames in an unbounded buffer and will not check a limit until it has received the set END_HEADERS flag, resulting in an OOM crash.
